DH2E.System.Title: Dark Heresy 2nd Edition
DH2E.HitLocation.Head: Head
DH2E.Movement.Title: Movement
DH2E.Skill.UntrainedBlocked: You must be trained in this skill to use it.
DH2E.Roll.Dialog.Title: Roll Options
DH2E.CalledShot.Title: Called Shot
DH2E.CalledShot.Head: Head
DH2E.CalledShot.SingleOnly: Called shots are only available on Standard Attack (Single Shot)
DH2E.Fate.BurnConfirm: Burning a Fate Point permanently reduces your maximum. Are you sure?
DH2E.Settings.ModifierCap.Name: Modifier Cap
DH2E.Settings.ModifierCap.Hint: Maximum total modifier (positive or negative) that can apply to a single roll.
DH2E.Settings.AutomateArmour.Name: Automate Armour
DH2E.Settings.AutomateArmour.Hint: Automatically subtract armour from damage calculations.
DH2E.Settings.AutomateDamage.Name: Automate Damage
DH2E.Settings.FateRefresh.Name: Fate Refresh on Session Start
DH2E.Settings.FateRefresh.Hint: Automatically refresh fate points to max when a session begins.
DH2E.Settings.XPMultiplier.Name: XP Cost Multiplier (%)
DH2E.Settings.XPMultiplier.Hint: Multiplier applied to all XP costs. 100 = normal, 50 = half cost.
DH2E.Settings.CriticalWounds.Name: Critical Wounds Table
DH2E.Settings.CriticalWounds.Hint: Enable automatic critical wounds table lookup at 0 wounds.
DH2E.Settings.ShowModifiers.Name: Show Modifier Breakdown
DH2E.Settings.ShowModifiers.Hint: Show the full modifier breakdown in chat cards by default.
DH2E.Settings.CompactNPC.Name: Compact NPC Sheets
DH2E.Settings.CompactNPC.Hint: Display NPC sheets in a condensed, GM-focused view.
DH2E.Settings.AllowPlayerXPEdit.Name: Allow Player XP Editing
DH2E.Settings.AllowPlayerXPEdit.Hint: When enabled, players can edit their own XP Total on the character sheet.
DH2E.Settings.StartingXP.Name: Starting XP
DH2E.Settings.StartingXP.Hint: Experience points granted to newly created characters via the creation wizard.
DH2E.Settings.CharGenMethod.Name: Characteristic Generation
DH2E.Settings.CharGenMethod.Hint: Method used to generate starting characteristics during character creation.
DH2E.Settings.WoundsRerolls.Name: Wounds Re-rolls
DH2E.Settings.WoundsRerolls.Hint: Maximum number of times a player may re-roll starting wounds during character creation. 0 = must keep first roll.
DH2E.Settings.DivinationRerolls.Name: Divination Re-rolls
DH2E.Settings.DivinationRerolls.Hint: Maximum number of times a player may re-roll the Emperor's Tarot during character creation. 0 = must keep first roll (RAW).
DH2E.Settings.InvertShiftRoll.Name: Invert Shift+Click Roll
DH2E.Settings.InvertShiftRoll.Hint: When OFF: click opens roll dialog, shift+click quick-rolls. When ON: click quick-rolls, shift+click opens dialog.
DH2E.Settings.WizardScale.Name: Wizard Scale (%)
DH2E.Settings.WizardScale.Hint: Zoom level for the character creation wizard. Scales all content proportionally.
DH2E.Settings.SheetScale.Name: Sheet Scale
DH2E.Settings.SheetScale.Hint: Scale the entire sheet window including header and frame. 100% is default size.
DH2E.Advancement.Title: Advancement
DH2E.XP.Award.Title: Award Experience
DH2E.XP.Award.NoPlayers: No players with assigned characters found.
DH2E.XP.Award.GMOnly: Only the GM can award XP.
DH2E.Request.Title: Request Roll
DH2E.Request.GMOnly: Only the GM can request rolls.
DH2E.Request.Prompt.Title: Roll Requested
DH2E.Creation.Characteristics.Title: Characteristics
DH2E.Creation.Characteristics.RolledDesc: Roll for each characteristic. You may re-roll one result (must keep the second roll).
DH2E.Creation.Characteristics.PointsDesc: Allocate {points} points across your characteristics. No stat may exceed {cap}.
DH2E.Origins.Title: Origins
DH2E.Creation.Wounds.Title: Starting Wounds
DH2E.Creation.Advancement.Title: Advancement
DH2E.Favorites.Title: Quick Actions
DH2E.Favorites.Empty: Star skills, powers, or weapons to add quick actions.
DH2E.Cybernetic.Maintenance.Title: Augmetic Maintenance
DH2E.Cybernetic.Maintenance.NoWarbandDat: Cannot determine current date — no active warband.
DH2E.Cybernetic.Maintenance.MinorSuggest: A bionic eye flickers to static. A mechadendrite spasms. Cosmetic and unsettling — a reminder that maintenance is overdue.
DH2E.Cybernetic.Maintenance.DegradedSugg: The augmetic is actively hindering its user. It trembles under load, produces persistent noise, drags slightly. The Machine Spirit is displeased.
DH2E.Cybernetic.Maintenance.FailureSugge: The Machine Spirit has departed. What remains is cold metal and inert circuitry, grafted to living flesh that aches around the implant sites.
DH2E.Migration.Errors: Migration completed with {count} error(s). See console.
DH2E.Critical.Title: Critical Damage
DH2E.RuleElement.Title: Rule Elements
DH2E.RuleElement.Empty: No rule elements. Click Edit to add effects.
DH2E.RuleElement.YAMLHint: YAML format — Ctrl+S to save, Esc to cancel
DH2E.Psychic.NoPsyRating: No Psy Rating — cannot use powers.
DH2E.Psychic.ModeUnfettered: Unfettered: PR x5 bonus. Phenomena on doubles.
DH2E.Psychic.ModePushed: Pushed: PR x10 bonus. Always triggers Phenomena (+25).
DH2E.Requisition.Title: Requisition
DH2E.GMOverride.Title: GM Override
DH2E.GMOverride.WoundsUndone: Wounds undone. Manually adjust the actor.
DH2E.GMOverride.AuditSeverity: GM adjusted critical severity from {old} to {new}.
DH2E.Settings.AutomatePhenomena.Name: Automate Psychic Phenomena
DH2E.Settings.AutomatePhenomena.Hint: Automatically roll on the phenomena/perils tables when triggered by pushed or unfettered powers.
DH2E.Settings.AutomateCorruption.Name: Automate Corruption Checks
DH2E.Settings.AutomateCorruption.Hint: Automatically run WP threshold tests when corruption increases past a threshold.
DH2E.Settings.AutomateInsanity.Name: Automate Insanity Checks
DH2E.Settings.AutomateInsanity.Hint: Automatically run WP threshold tests when insanity increases past a threshold.
DH2E.Settings.NpcDefaultCompact.Name: NPC Default Compact View
DH2E.Settings.NpcDefaultCompact.Hint: Open NPC sheets in compact stat-block view by default.
DH2E.Horde.BrokenMsg: {name} has been broken! Magnitude reduced to 0.
DH2E.Horde.HitRule: 1 base hit + 1 per DoS, all to one target
DH2E.Horde.NoLocationAP: Hordes use flat armour, not per-location
DH2E.Suppressive.Title: Suppressive Fire
DH2E.Suppressive.Pinning: All targets must test WP or become Pinned
DH2E.Suppressive.Hits: Targets acting in zone take 1d5 hits
DH2E.Overwatch.Title: Overwatch
DH2E.Overwatch.Rule: Free attack at -20 when enemy enters kill zone. Consumes Reaction.
DH2E.Grapple.Title: Grapple
DH2E.Grapple.Rule: Each round: opposed Strength tests. Actions: Damage, Push, Throw, Break Free.
DH2E.Settings.EnableCombatHUD.Name: Enable Combat HUD
DH2E.Settings.EnableCombatHUD.Hint: Show an Argon-style combat HUD at the bottom of the screen during combat.
DH2E.HUD.Title: Combat HUD
DH2E.Browser.Title: Compendium Browser
DH2E.Browser.DragHint: Drag to sheet or click to open
DH2E.Settings.DefaultViewMode.Name: Default Sheet View Mode
DH2E.Settings.DefaultViewMode.Hint: Which view mode to use when opening character sheets. Can be changed per-sheet.
DH2E.CompactView.StarHint: Star skills on the Skills tab to show them here.
DH2E.Settings.EnableAnimations.Name: Enable Animations
DH2E.Settings.EnableAnimations.Hint: Show visual animations for dice rolls, damage flashes, critical shakes, and UI transitions.
DH2E.Settings.EnableSounds.Name: Enable Sound Effects
DH2E.Settings.EnableSounds.Hint: Play sound effects for dice rolls, attacks, and other combat events.
DH2E.RuleBuilder.Title: Rule Element Builder
DH2E.RuleBuilder.Label: Label
DH2E.Encumbrance.Title: Encumbrance
DH2E.Fate.ChatSpend.Reroll: {name} spent a Fate Point to reroll.
DH2E.Fate.ChatSpend.HalfDamage: {name} spent a Fate Point to halve damage.
DH2E.Fate.ChatSpend.Survive: {name} burned a Fate Point to survive certain death!
DH2E.Fate.ChatSpend.AutoPass: {name} burned a Fate Point for automatic success!
DH2E.EliteAdvance.Title: Elite Advances
DH2E.Power.PsykerStatus: You are a Psyker with Psy Rating {pr}.
DH2E.Power.EmptyPsyker: Drag psychic powers from the compendium to add them.
DH2E.Warband.CannotDelete: The active warband cannot be deleted.
DH2E.Warband.DragHint: Drag Acolyte actors here to add members
DH2E.Warband.NoSkills: No skills found among warband members.
DH2E.Warband.AcolyteOnly: Only Acolyte actors can join a warband.
DH2E.Objective.Title: Objective
DH2E.Objective.Notification: {name} has been assigned a new objective: {title}
DH2E.Warband.InquisitorSlot: Drag an Acolyte or NPC here to set as Inquisitor
DH2E.Warband.InquisitorOnly: Only Acolyte or NPC actors can be set as Inquisitor.
DH2E.Settings.BlockUntrained.Name: Block Untrained Skill Rolls
DH2E.Settings.BlockUntrained.Hint: When enabled, players cannot roll skill uses for skills they are not trained in. GMs can always roll.
DH2E.Settings.RequireEliteApproval.Name: Require GM Approval for Elite Advances
DH2E.Settings.RequireEliteApproval.Hint: When enabled, players must request GM approval before purchasing elite advances (Psyker, Untouchable, Inquisitor). Does not affect auto-grants from character creation.
DH2E.Settings.AllowRuleEditing.Name: Allow Rule Element Editing
DH2E.Settings.AllowRuleEditing.Hint: When enabled, the YAML and Visual rule element editors are available on item sheets. Disable to prevent accidental rule changes.
DH2E.EliteApproval.Denied: Your request for {name} was denied by the GM.
DH2E.EliteApproval.GMOffline: No GM is currently online to approve your request.
DH2E.GMGrant.Title: Grant Advance
DH2E.GMGrant.FlavorPlaceholder: Your near-death experience twisted your perception of the world...
DH2E.GMGrant.GMOnly: Only the GM can grant advances.
DH2E.Requisition.ModificationsHint: Free-text notes (e.g., red-dot sight, extended magazine)
DH2E.Requisition.Approved: Your requisition for {name} has been approved.
DH2E.Requisition.ApprovedDelayed: Your requisition for {name} has been approved. Delivery in {time}.
DH2E.Requisition.Denied: Your requisition for {name} has been denied.
DH2E.Warband.Inventory.Empty: No items in warband inventory. Drag items here to add them.
DH2E.Settings.WarbandInventoryAccess.Hin: Who can add, remove, and assign items in the warband inventory.
DH2E.Settings.EnableVFX.Name: Enable Visual Effects (JB2A)
DH2E.Settings.EnableVFX.Hint: Play visual effects for attacks, psychic powers, and combat actions when Sequencer and JB2A modules are installed.
DH2E.Settings.VFXIntensity.Name: VFX Intensity
DH2E.Settings.VFXIntensity.Hint: Controls which visual effects are played. Minimal: projectiles only. Normal: projectiles, psychic effects, damage impacts. Full: all effects including suppressive fire and auras.
DH2E.Settings.EnableDSN.Name: Dice So Nice Imperial Themes
DH2E.Settings.EnableDSN.Hint: Register Imperial-themed dice presets when Dice So Nice is installed.
DH2E.Settings.EnableRulerOverlay.Name: Ruler Movement Overlay
DH2E.Settings.EnableRulerOverlay.Hint: Color-code ruler segments based on DH2E movement rates (half/full/charge/run).
DH2E.Settings.EnableTMFX.Name: Token Magic FX Condition Filters
DH2E.Settings.EnableTMFX.Hint: Auto-apply visual token filters when conditions are applied (requires Token Magic FX).
DH2E.Settings.EnableFXMaster.Name: FX Master Weather Presets
DH2E.Settings.EnableFXMaster.Hint: Enable 40k-themed weather presets when FX Master is installed.
DH2E.Settings.DeadlineNotifications.Name: Deadline Notifications
DH2E.Settings.DeadlineNotifications.Hint: Show banner notifications when objective deadlines approach or pass.
DH2E.DSN.Aquila: Imperial Aquila — Gold on Dark Steel
DH2E.FXMaster.Title: Weather Presets
DH2E.FXMaster.AshWasteStorm.Name: Ash Waste Storm
DH2E.FXMaster.AshWasteStorm.Desc: Orange dust particles with reduced visibility — the ash wastes of a dead world.
DH2E.FXMaster.AcidRain.Name: Acid Rain
DH2E.FXMaster.AcidRain.Desc: Green-tinted rain with toxic fog — industrial runoff from hive manufactorums.
DH2E.FXMaster.HiveSmog.Name: Hive Smog
DH2E.FXMaster.HiveSmog.Desc: Thick grey fog with occasional lightning — the choking air of an underhive.
DH2E.FXMaster.WarpRift.Name: Warp Rift
DH2E.FXMaster.WarpRift.Desc: Purple swirling particles — the fabric of reality tears open.
DH2E.FXMaster.VoidExposure.Name: Void Exposure
DH2E.FXMaster.VoidExposure.Desc: Minimal particles, dark overlay — the cold emptiness of space.
DH2E.FXMaster.PromethiumFire.Name: Promethium Fire
DH2E.FXMaster.PromethiumFire.Desc: Embers and ground fire — the aftermath of a promethium bombardment.
DH2E.FXMaster.Blizzard.Name: Blizzard
DH2E.FXMaster.Blizzard.Desc: Heavy snow and wind — the frozen wastes of an ice world.
DH2E.FXMaster.BloodRain.Name: Blood Rain
DH2E.FXMaster.BloodRain.Desc: Red-tinted rain — a sign of Chaos corruption tainting the heavens.
DH2E.Chronicle.Empty: No chronicle entries yet. The annals of the warband await.
DH2E.Chronicle.NoActiveObjectives: No active objectives to set deadlines on.
DH2E.Chronicle.Deadline.Title: Objective Deadlines
DH2E.HUD.SlotEmpty: Empty slot — drag an action here
DH2E.ActionsGrid.Title: Actions Grid
DH2E.Macro.NoActor: No actor found. Assign a character or select a token.
DH2E.Macro.WeaponNotFound: Weapon not found on the current actor.
DH2E.Settings.CombatHUDPosition.Name: Combat HUD Position
DH2E.Settings.CombatHUDPosition.Hint: Where to display the compact combat HUD panel.
DH2E.Vox.GMOnly: Only the Game Master can send vox transmissions.
